summary: Both REQ-6 and REQ-7 appear to be fully implemented in the diff. The visual theme has been updated across App.tsx, BillingForm.tsx, BillSummary.tsx, and index.css with grey background, white card container (420px), orange #ff5722 accents, dashed table row borders, and centered layout. The Download Bill button is implemented in blue (#2196f3) with a file download named 'zweeti-bill.txt' and is hidden during print.
